verb.definition: Focus all one's attention on a particular object or activity.
verb.example: She couldn't concentrate on the film.

verb.definition: Gather (people or things) together in numbers or in a mass.
verb.example: Troops were concentrating at the border.

noun.definition: A substance made by removing water or other diluting agent.

usage_examples: I need to concentrate on my work.
The sauce uses tomato concentrate for flavor.
